allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct schema field names in cloneTemplate function

Fixed field mismatches identified in PR review:
- Changed title -> dayTitle, description -> overview
- Changed nationalParkId -> national_park_id  
- Removed invalid ''nights'' field from itineraryAccommodations
- Removed unnecessary ''any'' type annotation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
